name: CentOS 6.2
description:
This image has been created using OpenNebula. It has been tested with KVM, although since it's a RAW image it should work with Xen and even VMware (using qemu-img convert).

Install Media: CentOS-6.2-x86_64-minimal.iso
Disk layout: Single partition 10G ext4
Architecture: x86_64

The login information for this VM is

login: root
password: centos

It has been prepared to work with OpenNebula, i.e. it's contextualized.
